description: Returns information about a specific Amazon Kinesis Analytics application. If you want to retrieve a list of all applications in your account, use the ListApplications operation. This operation requires permissions to perform the kinesisanalytics:DescribeApplication action. You can use DescribeApplication to get the current application versionId, which you need to call other operations such as Update.

nested_items.name: ApplicationDetail
nested_items.description: Provides a description of the application, such as the application Amazon Resource Name (ARN), status, latest version, and input and output configuration details.

nested_items.name: ApplicationName
nested_items.description: Name of the application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationDescription
nested_items.description: Description of the application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationARN
nested_items.description: ARN of the application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationStatus
nested_items.description: Status of the application.

nested_items.name: CreateTimestamp
nested_items.description: Time stamp when the application version was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdateTimestamp
nested_items.description: Time stamp when the application was last updated.

nested_items.name: InputDescriptions
nested_items.description: Describes the application input configuration. For more information, see Configuring Application Input.

nested_items.name: InputId
nested_items.description: Input ID associated with the application input. This is the ID that Amazon Kinesis Analytics assigns to each input configuration you add to your application.

nested_items.name: NamePrefix
nested_items.description: In-application name prefix.

nested_items.name: InAppStreamNames
nested_items.description: Returns the in-application stream names that are mapped to the stream source.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: InputProcessingConfigurationDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the preprocessor that executes on records in this input before the application's code is run.

nested_items.name: InputLambdaProcessorDescription
nested_items.description: Provides configuration information about the associated InputLambdaProcessorDescription.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the AWS Lambda function that is used to preprocess the records in the stream.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that is used to access the AWS Lambda function.

nested_items.name: KinesisStreamsInputDescription
nested_items.description: If an Amazon Kinesis stream is configured as streaming source, provides Amazon Kinesis stream's Amazon Resource Name (ARN) and an IAM role that enables Amazon Kinesis Analytics to access the stream on your behalf.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Kinesis stream.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Kinesis Analytics can assume to access the stream.

nested_items.name: KinesisFirehoseInputDescription
nested_items.description: If an Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream is configured as a streaming source, provides the delivery stream's ARN and an IAM role that enables Amazon Kinesis Analytics to access the stream on your behalf.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Kinesis Analytics assumes to access the stream.

nested_items.name: InputSchema
nested_items.description: Describes the format of the data in the streaming source, and how each data element maps to corresponding columns in the in-application stream that is being created.

nested_items.name: RecordFormat
nested_items.description: Specifies the format of the records on the streaming source.

nested_items.name: RecordFormatType
nested_items.description: The type of record format.

nested_items.name: MappingParameters
nested_items.description: When configuring application input at the time of creating or updating an application, provides additional mapping information specific to the record format (such as JSON, CSV, or record fields delimited by some delimiter) on the streaming source.

nested_items.name: JSONMappingParameters
nested_items.description: Provides additional mapping information when JSON is the record format on the streaming source.

nested_items.name: RecordRowPath
nested_items.description: Path to the top-level parent that contains the records.

nested_items.name: CSVMappingParameters
nested_items.description: Provides additional mapping information when the record format uses delimiters (for example, CSV).

nested_items.name: RecordRowDelimiter
nested_items.description: Row delimiter. For example, in a CSV format, --n' is the typical row delimiter.

nested_items.name: RecordColumnDelimiter
nested_items.description: Column delimiter. For example, in a CSV format, a comma (',') is the typical column delimiter.

nested_items.name: RecordEncoding
nested_items.description: Specifies the encoding of the records in the streaming source. For example, UTF-8.

nested_items.name: RecordColumns
nested_items.description: A list of RecordColumn objects.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the column created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

nested_items.name: Mapping
nested_items.description: Reference to the data element in the streaming input or the reference data source. This element is required if the RecordFormatType is JSON.

nested_items.name: SqlType
nested_items.description: Type of column created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

nested_items.name: InputParallelism
nested_items.description: Describes the configured parallelism (number of in-application streams mapped to the streaming source).

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: Number of in-application streams to create. For more information, see Limits.

nested_items.name: InputStartingPositionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Point at which the application is configured to read from the input stream.

nested_items.name: InputStartingPosition
nested_items.description: The starting position on the stream.
NOW - Start reading just after the most recent record in the stream, start at the request time stamp that the customer issued.

TRIM_HORIZON - Start reading at the last untrimmed record in the stream, which is the oldest record available in the stream. This option is not available for an Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream.
LAST_STOPPED_POINT - Resume reading from where the application last stopped reading.

nested_items.name: OutputDescriptions
nested_items.description: Describes the application output configuration. For more information, see Configuring Application Output.

nested_items.name: OutputId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the output configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the in-application stream configured as output.

nested_items.name: KinesisStreamsOutputDescription
nested_items.description: Describes Amazon Kinesis stream configured as the destination where output is written.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Kinesis stream.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Kinesis Analytics can assume to access the stream.

nested_items.name: KinesisFirehoseOutputDescription
nested_items.description: Describes the Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream configured as the destination where output is written.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Kinesis Analytics can assume to access the stream.

nested_items.name: LambdaOutputDescription
nested_items.description: Describes the AWS Lambda function configured as the destination where output is written.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination Lambda function.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Kinesis Analytics can assume to write to the destination function.

nested_items.name: DestinationSchema
nested_items.description: Data format used for writing data to the destination.

nested_items.name: RecordFormatType
nested_items.description: Specifies the format of the records on the output stream.

nested_items.name: ReferenceDataSourceDescriptions
nested_items.description: Describes reference data sources configured for the application. For more information, see Configuring Application Input.

nested_items.name: ReferenceId
nested_items.description: ID of the reference data source. This is the ID that Amazon Kinesis Analytics assigns when you add the reference data source to your application using the AddApplicationReferenceDataSource operation.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The in-application table name created by the specific reference data source configuration.

nested_items.name: S3ReferenceDataSourceDescription
nested_items.description: Provides the S3 bucket name, the object key name that contains the reference data. It also provides the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that Amazon Kinesis Analytics can assume to read the Amazon S3 object and populate the in-application reference table.

nested_items.name: BucketARN
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: FileKey
nested_items.description: Amazon S3 object key name.

nested_items.name: ReferenceRoleARN
nested_items.description: ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Kinesis Analytics can assume to read the Amazon S3 object on your behalf to populate the in-application reference table.

nested_items.name: ReferenceSchema
nested_items.description: Describes the format of the data in the streaming source, and how each data element maps to corresponding columns created in the in-application stream.

nested_items.name: RecordFormat
nested_items.description: Specifies the format of the records on the streaming source.

nested_items.name: RecordFormatType
nested_items.description: The type of record format.

nested_items.name: MappingParameters
nested_items.description: When configuring application input at the time of creating or updating an application, provides additional mapping information specific to the record format (such as JSON, CSV, or record fields delimited by some delimiter) on the streaming source.

nested_items.name: JSONMappingParameters
nested_items.description: Provides additional mapping information when JSON is the record format on the streaming source.

nested_items.name: RecordRowPath
nested_items.description: Path to the top-level parent that contains the records.

nested_items.name: CSVMappingParameters
nested_items.description: Provides additional mapping information when the record format uses delimiters (for example, CSV).

nested_items.name: RecordRowDelimiter
nested_items.description: Row delimiter. For example, in a CSV format, --n' is the typical row delimiter.

nested_items.name: RecordColumnDelimiter
nested_items.description: Column delimiter. For example, in a CSV format, a comma (',') is the typical column delimiter.

nested_items.name: RecordEncoding
nested_items.description: Specifies the encoding of the records in the streaming source. For example, UTF-8.

nested_items.name: RecordColumns
nested_items.description: A list of RecordColumn objects.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the column created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

nested_items.name: Mapping
nested_items.description: Reference to the data element in the streaming input or the reference data source. This element is required if the RecordFormatType is JSON.

nested_items.name: SqlType
nested_items.description: Type of column created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLoggingOptionDescriptions
nested_items.description: Describes the CloudWatch log streams that are configured to receive application messages. For more information about using CloudWatch log streams with Amazon Kinesis Analytics applications, see Working with Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLoggingOptionId
nested_items.description: ID of the CloudWatch logging option description.

nested_items.name: LogStreamARN
nested_items.description: ARN of the CloudWatch log to receive application messages.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: IAM ARN of the role to use to send application messages. Note: To write application messages to CloudWatch, the IAM role used must have the PutLogEvents policy action enabled.

nested_items.name: ApplicationCode
nested_items.description: Returns the application code that you provided to perform data analysis on any of the in-application streams in your application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationVersionId
nested_items.description: Provides the current application version.
